discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
A “your connection is not private” error means the website you were trying to visit does not have an up-to-date SSL (secure sockets layer) security certificate. Website owners must maintain the licensing regularly to ensure the site encryption capabilities are up-to-date

Selected Answer: C
C. Report the error to the bank.

The error message "Your connection is not private. Authority invalid." typically indicates a problem with the SSL/TLS certificate of the website, which could be a potential security risk. In this situation, the user should not proceed to the site, as it might be an attempt at a man-in-the-middle attack or other security issues.

The recommended action is to report the error to the bank. The bank's IT or security team needs to be informed so they can investigate and address the issue with their website's security certificate. Users should avoid entering sensitive information on a website with such an error until the issue is resolved.

questions.question_text:
A user receives an error message from an online banking site that states the following:

Your connection is not private. Authority invalid.

Which of the following actions should the user take next?

choices.C: Report the error to the bank.

questions.question_text: Which of the following filesystems replaced FAT as the preferred filesystem for Microsoft Windows OS?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. NTFS

NTFS (New Technology File System) replaced FAT (File Allocation Table) as the preferred file system for Microsoft Windows operating systems. NTFS was introduced with Windows NT and has been the default file system for Windows operating systems since then.

Selected Answer: C
On Windows 10 Home and Windows 10 Professional editions: Select Start > Settings > Accounts > Family & other users. Under Other users, select Add someone else to this PC. Enter that person's Microsoft account information and follow the prompts.

questions.question_text: A user requires local administrative access to a workstation. Which of the following Control Panel utilities allows the technician to grant access to the user?

A systems administrator received a request to limit the amount of cellular data a user's Windows 10 tablet can utilize when traveling. Which of the following can the administrator do to best solve the user's issue?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Metered = capping the data

choices.C: Configure the device to use a static IP address.
choices.B: Set the connection to be metered.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The principle of least privilege (PoLP) is an information security concept which maintains that a user or entity should only have access to the specific data, resources and applications needed to complete a required task

questions.question_text: Which of the following is used to ensure users have the appropriate level of access to perform their job functions?
